meanings.definition: In a manner showing the loss of all hope
meanings.sent1: She looked despairingly at the empty fridge, knowing there was no food left.
meanings.sent2: He sighed despairingly as he realized he had missed the last bus home.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed despairingly at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The wilting flower in the neglected garden drooped despairingly, longing for water.
meanings.sent5: The student stared despairingly at the blank page, unable to start writing the essay.

meanings.definition: In a way that expresses complete hopelessness or discouragement
meanings.sent1: The old man shook his head despairingly, feeling defeated by the challenges ahead.
meanings.sent2: She spoke despairingly about the state of the world, feeling overwhelmed by the negativity.
meanings.sent3: The toddler pouted despairingly when told it was bedtime, not wanting to stop playing.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered despairingly in the sky, foretelling a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The injured bird chirped despairingly, unable to fly and join its flock.
